item.title: Automatic Dependent Surveillance-Broadcast (ADS-B) System – Link and Display Processor Unit (LDPU) (STC ST01103SE) (EFB Not Installed)

note.para: Cockpit Display of Traffic Information (CDTI) display of data from other aircraft systems may be used.

placard.para: Placard ADS-B LDPU "INOP" and enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.
